-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Utility to call iwconfig.
--   
--   This program choses between the available open wireless networks and
--   tries to connect to them using DHCP.
@package n-m
@version 0.0.1


-- | This module provides functions to parse the output of <tt>iwlist
--   scan</tt>.
module Network.Cell

-- | Each available network.
newtype Cell
Cell :: [String] -> Cell

-- | Get the list of available networks, given the output of <tt>iwlist
--   scan</tt>.
getCells :: [String] -> [Cell]

-- | Gets the field <tt>Quality</tt>.
getQuality :: Cell -> Int

-- | Checks whether the network is open.
isOpen :: Cell -> Bool

-- | Gets the field with <tt>name</tt>.
getValue :: String -> Cell -> String

-- | Gets the <tt>essid</tt>s of networks that don't use encryption.
getOpenEssids :: [Cell] -> [String]
instance Eq Cell
instance Ord Cell
